name: RiverheadCiderhouse
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Mature. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: You will receive weekly updates about our current hours, the entertainment for the week and any special events that are happening. WE will also give updates on new cider launches and whats going on tap.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
